item.title: Ansible 101
item.description: Ansible is my favorite configuration management tool, its uses YAML and Python, so you have a winning combo to begin with. One of the main things of why i enjoy using it, is basically that it doesn’t require an installation on the target servers and that is a big factor that in my opinion defeats other management tools like Chef or Puppet…..
